content: what is fornite

rag: Fortnite is a popular game developed by Epic Games and is available on multiple platforms. It features a large world where players can explore, build structures, and battle against other players. The objective of the game is to be the last player or team standing, and it includes PC as one of the platforms.

what is nvidia

external response: Nvidia is an American technology company that specializes in producing graphics processing units (GPUs) for various markets, including gaming, professional, and AI applications. It also manufactures workstations, laptops, and system-on-chips for the automotive market. The company is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

external response: Anthony Edwards is an American actor, known for his roles in films such as "Top Gun" (1986), "Revenge of the Nerds" (1984), and "The Firm" (1993). He has also appeared in numerous television shows, including "ER" (1994-2009) and "American Horror Story" (2011-present).
tell me about lebron james

external response: LeBron James is a professional basketball player in the NBA (National Basketball Association). He has played for the Miami Heat, Cleveland Cavaliers, and Los Angeles Lakers. James is widely considered one of the greatest basketball players of all time, with four NBA championships, four Most Valuable Player (MVP) awards, and two Olympic gold medals. He is also known for his versatility, athleticism, and leadership on and off the court.
who is stephen curry?

external response: Stephen Curry is an American professional basketball player for the NBA's Golden State Warriors. He is a six-time NBA All-Star, two-time NBA MVP, and four-time NBA champion. Curry is known for his long-range shooting ability and quick handling. He was drafted seventh overall in the 2009 NBA Draft.

who is michael jordan?

external response: Michael Jordan is a retired American professional basketball player. He played 15 seasons in the NBA, primarily with the Chicago Bulls (1984-1998), and is widely regarded as the greatest basketball player of all time. Jordan won six NBA championships, five MVP awards, and was a ten-time scoring champion. He is also an eleven-time NBA All-Star and a ten-time All-NBA First Team member. Jordan's individual accolades include the NBA Defensive Player of the Year Award, five MVP awards, and ten scoring titles. He was a 14-time All-Star and a 10-time All-NBA First Team member. Jordan's net worth is estimated to be over $1.6 billion.
